org.kiji.schema.impl
Class HBaseKijiTableWriter

java.lang.Object
  org.kiji.schema.KijiTableWriter
      org.kiji.schema.impl.HBaseKijiTableWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable
public class HBaseKijiTableWriter
extends KijiTableWriter

Makes modifications to a Kiji table by sending requests directly to HBase from the local client.

Constructor Summary
HBaseKijiTableWriter(KijiTable table)
          Creates a non-buffered kiji table writer that sends modifications directly to Kiji.
HBaseKijiTableWriter(KijiTable table, int maxBufferedPuts)
          Creates a buffered kiji table writer that sends modifications directly to Kiji.
 
Method Summary
 void deleteCell(EntityId entityId, String family, String qualifier, long timestamp)
          Deletes a single cell with a specified timestamp.
 void deleteColumn(EntityId entityId, String family, String qualifier, long upToTimestamp)
          Deletes all cells with a timestamp less than or equal to the specified timestamp.
 void deleteFamily(EntityId entityId, String family, long upToTimestamp)
          Deletes all cells from a family with a timestamp less than or equal to the specified timestamp.
 void deleteRow(EntityId entityId, long upToTimestamp)
          Delete all cells from a row with a timestamp less than or equal to the specified timestamp.
 void flush()
          Flushes the pending modifications to the table.
 KijiCounter increment(EntityId entityId, String family, String qualifier, long amount)
          Increments a counter in a kiji table.

Constructor Detail

HBaseKijiTableWriter

public HBaseKijiTableWriter(KijiTable table)
                     throws IOException
Creates a non-buffered kiji table writer that sends modifications directly to Kiji.

Parameters:
table - A kiji table.
Throws:
IOException - If there is an error creating the writer.

HBaseKijiTableWriter

public HBaseKijiTableWriter(KijiTable table,
                            int maxBufferedPuts)
                     throws IOException
Creates a buffered kiji table writer that sends modifications directly to Kiji.

Parameters:
table - A kiji table.
maxBufferedPuts - When this number of puts have been stored in the buffer it will auto-flush.
Throws:
IOException - If there is an error creating the writer.
Method Detail

put

public void put(EntityId entityId,
                String family,
                String qualifier,
                long timestamp,
                KijiCell<?> cell)
         throws IOException,
                InterruptedException
Puts a cell into a kiji table.

Specified by:
put in class KijiTableWriter
Parameters:
entityId - The entity (row) to put data into.
family - A column family.
qualifier - A column qualifier.
timestamp - The timestamp to put the data at (use HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP for current time).
cell - The data to write.
Throws:
IOException - If there is an IO error.
InterruptedException - If the write is interrupted.

increment

public KijiCounter increment(EntityId entityId,
                             String family,
                             String qualifier,
                             long amount)
                      throws IOException
Increments a counter in a kiji table.

This method will throw an exception if called on a column that isn't a counter.

Specified by:
increment in class KijiTableWriter
Parameters:
entityId - The entity (row) that contains the counter.
family - A column family.
qualifier - A column qualifier.
amount - The amount to increment the counter (may be negative).
Returns:
The new counter value, post increment.
Throws:
IOException - If there is an IO error.

Deletes a single cell with a specified timestamp.

Specified by:
deleteCell in class KijiTableWriter
Parameters:
entityId - The entity (row) to delete data from.
family - A column family.
qualifier - A column qualifier.
timestamp - The timestamp of the cell to delete (use HConstants.LATEST_TIMESTAMP to delete the most recent cell in the column).
Throws:
IOException - If there is an IO error.
